Hi, I am Digvijay. I love exploring emerging technologies and identifying promising trends in research and development. My study mainly focuses on the development of computational methodologies for data-intensive science. Being pragmatic in this world now I am ready to give professional exposure to my knowledge. I want to leverage my skills in the field of Computer Science by solving more challenging problems and developing high-quality products.
I am currently pursuing my masters at the University of Southern California. I have received my Bachelor’s degree from the University of Pune, India and I have been awarded The Best Outgoing Student Award and a Gold Medal by award from Dr. R. Mashelkar  who is one of India’s most pioneering scientists, for my stellar academic performance during my undergraduate.
Apart from studies, you will also find me writing on medium.com, reading books, or going for hiking to kick-start the adrenaline rush.
